item.name: <italic:!><gradient:#E0AD20:#EE4432>Totem of Fire
lore: <color:gray>as death consumes you your skin will harden and the pain will fade

item.name: <italic:!><gradient:#464BB3:#6DE0ED>Totem of Water
lore: <color:gray>on the brink of death you will feel your lungs fill with air

item.name: <italic:!><gradient:#AF0587:#FF0051>Totem of Magic
lore: <color:gray>undoubtedly even an experienced mage won't expect you to recover with such wounds.
<color:gray>you may feel a cloak form around you to protect you from their vision

item.name: <italic:!><gradient:#031CE3:#2EFF00>Totem of Gravity
lore: <color:gray>gravity is not forgiving, but this just once it will let you continue on your journey
